name: Aerodrome Stable DAI-USDbC
description: This token represents a Aerodrome liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Aerodrome's gauges to earn emissions. This stablepool contains DAI and USDbC.
